item.title: Tensorboard
item.description: In this assignment we are going to use Tensorboard a tool provided with tensorflow to visualize and debug(if necessary) our neural networks visually. I am going to visualize all the parameteres that have the properties which enables us to debug our neural networks or gives us a fair intution on how and what goes wrong. I will try and do this assignment in google colab, although it will be difficult, I will try my best.
